reservations.name: Naples Beach Resort
reservations.description: A beachfront hotel offering stunning views and easy access to the beach.

transportation.name: Rental Car
transportation.description: A reliable car rental for easy travel around Naples.

day1.day_description: Arrival and beach relaxation on the first day.

activities.title: Vanderbilt Beach
activities.description: Relax at this popular beach with soft sand and clear waters.

activities.title: The Turtle Club
activities.description: Enjoy beachfront dining with fresh seafood options.

activities.title: Sunset at the Pier
activities.description: Watch a beautiful sunset at Naples Pier.

activities.title: DB Cooper's
activities.description: Casual dining spot with drinks and appetizers.

day2.day_description: Exploring local attractions and experiencing Naples culture.

activities.title: Naples Botanical Garden
activities.description: Stroll through vibrant gardens showcasing local and exotic plants.

activities.title: The Naples Players
activities.description: Enjoy a dinner and a show at a local theater.

activities.title: Tin City
activities.description: Explore this historic waterfront marketplace with shops and eateries.

activities.title: Old Naples Pub
activities.description: Relaxed pub serving American classics and a local brews.

day3.day_description: Adventure and outdoor activities in the beautiful natural parks.

activities.title: Everglades National Park
activities.description: Take a day trip to explore the unique ecosystem of the Everglades.

activities.title: Sweet Melissa's
activities.description: Fine dining with an emphasis on seasonal local ingredients.

activities.title: Kayaking Tour
activities.description: Join a guided kayak tour through the mangroves.

activities.title: The Good Life
activities.description: Relaxed restaurant with a good selection of craft beers and comfort food.

day4.day_description: Relaxation and heading back home after a fulfilling trip.

activities.title: Naples Zoo
activities.description: Visit the Naples Zoo to see a variety of animals and exhibits.

activities.title: Royal Scoop Ice Cream
activities.description: End your trip with some of Naples' best ice cream.

activities.title: Fifth Avenue South
activities.description: Explore shops and boutiques on this vibrant street.

activities.title: Bistro 821
activities.description: A local favorite for a delicious lunch before departure.
